content: @Grahame Grieve , on the THO downloads page (https://terminology.hl7.org/downloads.html) how do the master/r3/r4/r5 NPM packages differ? I'd like to document more about these packages on this page as it is currently unclear.

well, the r3/r4/r5 are version specific - in the stated version, so you refer to the package in your dependencies, depending which version you want. The base package, version is dependent on the stated version in THO, and may change in the future
